com.github.noxan.blommagraphs.generator.impl

Class DefaultTaskGraphGenerator

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.noxan.blommagraphs.generator.impl.DefaultTaskGraphGenerator
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    TaskGraphGenerator

    public class DefaultTaskGraphGenerator
extends java.lang.Object
implements TaskGraphGenerator
    TaskgraphGenerator implementation with a random seed and parameters to restrict the randomly generated Graph. Following parameters could be set through setter.
    • long seed - seed to generate randomly
    • int numberOfNodes
    • int minIncomingEdges
    • int maxIncomingEdges
    • int spreadEdges
    • int minComputationTime
    • int maxComputationTime
    • int spreadComputationTime
    • int minCommunicationTime
    • int maxCommunicationTime
    • int spreadCommunicationTime
